HiddenText.Name: What do I do if a student asks to be added to my course, or asks for course authorizations?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What do I do if a student asks to be added to my course, or asks for course authorizations?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: We ask that instructors forward any Course Authorization Requests from students to the Online Support Center at: onlinelearning@byui.edu. Feel free to respond to students to let them know their request has been forwarded to the Online Support Center for review.
